SEARCH
程序包 com.virtualbankv2.entity

类 Account

java.lang.Object
com.virtualbankv2.entity.Account
public class Account extends Object
The Account class represents a bank account with relevant details such as account ID, type, username, password, balance, and status.
从以下版本开始:
2024-04-13
版本:
1.0
作者:
Zhenghan Zhong

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Account

      public Account(String accountID, String accountType, String username, String password, double balance, String status)
      Constructs a new Account with the specified details.
      参数:
      accountID - the unique identifier for the account
      accountType - the type of the account
      username - the username associated with the account
      password - the password for accessing the account
      balance - the current balance of the account
      status - the status of the account
